content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Area (x=1-5, y=1-3.5)
Consists of three parallel smelting lines:
- Furnace at (1,1) with burner inserter (1.5,2.5) outputting to chest (1.5,3.5)
- Furnace at (3,1) with burner inserter (3.5,2.5) outputting to chest (3.5,3.5)
- Furnace at (5,1) with burner inserter (5.5,2.5) outputting to chest (5.5,3.5)

### Copper Plate Production Area (x=2-4.5, y=7-9.5)
Two parallel smelting lines with belt transport:
- Furnace at (2,7) with burner inserter (2.5,8.5) outputting to chest (2.5,9.5)
- Furnace at (4,7) with burner inserter (4.5,8.5) outputting to chest (4.5,9.5)
- Belt system connecting the output chests
- Additional burner inserter (3.5,9.5) for material transfer

### Copper Cable Production Line (x=14.5, y=11.5-14.5)
Assembly line setup:
- Input chest at (14.5,11.5)
- Burner inserter at (14.5,12.5)
- Assembling machine at (14.5,14.5)
- Output handling with burner inserters and chests at (11.5,14.5)

### Electronic Circuit Production Line (x=21.5, y=11.5-15.5)
Assembly line setup:
- Input chests at (21.5,11.5) for iron plates and (21.5,12.5) for copper cables
- Burner inserter at (21.5,13.5)
- Assembling machine at (21.5,15.5)

### Power Generation System (x=-5.5 to 13.5, y=26.5-40.5)
Complete power generation setup:
- Offshore pump at (2.5,35.5)
- Boiler at (7.0,35.5)
- Steam engine at (13.5,35.5)
- Pipe network connecting components
- Electricity distribution network with multiple poles

ERROR TIPS

### Assembling Machine Resource Management
- Ensure consistent supply of raw materials to prevent ingredient shortages in assembling machines
- Monitor input chest inventory levels to maintain production flow

### Fluid System Connectivity
- When placing offshore pumps, ensure they are connected to the intended fluid network
- One offshore pump at (-5.5,26.5) shows "No fluid present in connections" warning

### Production Line Efficiency
- Monitor and balance input/output ratios to prevent bottlenecks
- Several inserters show "waiting for source items" status, indicating potential supply chain issues

### Chest Management
- Some chests are showing full status - implement better item extraction logic
- Balance chest capacities with production rates to prevent overflow or shortages
